title: 2Pac, Steve Mentoring, Mrs. Junior Spates, Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: 2Pac, Steve Mentoring, Mrs. Junior Spates, Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The CLO had to cut through a couple red hot letters. Steve will have something special on Saturday that will help you move past the pain. Kevin Hart has a new movie coming up on Netflix and got something just for The Steve Harvey Nation from Budapest. Book, Street, Common and Uncommon are the four senses and someone in Tampa, FL lacks them all. Junior said something about Sheryl Underwood that will blow your wig back! In Reality Update, Carla talks about Jill Scott and her new podcast. Happy Belated Birthday Tupac Shakur! Today Big Dog wraps up with a perfectly good lie! "BYE!"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
